description: Triangle T(n,k) giving coefficients in expansion of n!*binomial(x-n,n) in powers of x.
formula: n!*binomial(x-n, n)= Sum T(n, k)*x^(n-k), k=0..n.
maple: a054655_row := proc(n) local k; seq(coeff(expand((-1)^n*pochhammer (n-x,n)),x,n-k),k=0..n) end: [Peter Luschny, Nov 28 2010]
mathematica: row[n_] := Table[ Coefficient[(-1)^n*Pochhammer[n - x, n], x, n - k], {k, 0, n}]; A054655 = Flatten[ Table[ row[n], {n, 0, 8}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 06 2012, after Peter Luschny *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 18 2000
